contentfulSermon.title: This Functional Family: Week 5 - Dealing with a Rebellious Kid

fields.notesFormatted:
Who's to Blame?

Luke 15:11-32, Ezekiel 18:1-20, Genesis 3:1-7, Proverbs 22:6

  • It’s the rebel’s fault!
  • Parents have great influence – but not ultimate control

Lessons from The "Prodigal Son"

Luke 15:11-32, Judges 10:10-16, Colossians 3:13

  • When they insist on leaving – Let them leave
  • When things get tough – Don't run to the rescue
  • If they come back – Run to greet them
